Title: Revolutionary friendship. Friends from Asia, Africa and Latin America visit the Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: This is a print from the eighth edition (October 1964), with the title also in Tibetan. A print from the first edition is in the collection of the IISH (BG E16/365).
Tags: Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution
中国人民革命军事博物馆
